EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-12-07(Final).Send
EmailTemplate.subject: TurboShot|Learn How To Make The Most Of VDI Environments & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Turbonomic, {{lead.First Name:default=}} Here's your monthly dose of Turbonomic. Want to be featured? Let us know! <[[mailto:Murphy.Vandervelde@VMTurbo.com?Subject=Featured Customer]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4017-vdi-environments-in-turbonomic?utm_source=turbonomic&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&amp;utm_content=12072016]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4011?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=12072016#whatsHappening]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4011?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=12072016#tipsTricks]]> Featured Customer Bart van Es & Quintiq This month we are very excited to feature our first customer from outside of North America; Bart van Es from Quintiq in the Netherlands! Quntiq came onboard as customers back in 2014. Bart was tasked with managing and supporting the growing multi-national virtual estate, which was no easy feat. He found himself monitoring the environments and waiting for alerts to let his team know when something broke. Find out how we fixed it. Read More » <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4011?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016#featuredCustomer]]> Featured Technology Virtual Desktop Pulse Survey 2016 Part 1 of 4 This month, Turbonomic has intentionally focused on virtual desktops to better understand the current state and rates of adoption, as well as areas where VDI has met, exceeded or failed to meet firms’ investment hopes. In this pursuit, we crafted the Virtual Desktop Pulse Survey 2016. Read More » <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/virtual-desktop-pulse-survey-2016-part-1-of-4/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=12072016#featuredTech]]>
